title: arivEn arindEn enru Ayiram
sahitya:
arivEn arindEn enru Ayiram murai sholli azhaittu vADi pODi


anupallavi

  uri koNDa veNNai kavarum uttamaranrO kaNNan Urukku arashar maghan sheidAlum taghumO


caraNam    veNNai-yuNDirundAl maTTum vIram mighundirukkum maNNai-yuNDirundAlE mandam mighundAranrO 
kaNNanaik-kavarndu innum karuttai kavarnda pinnum tannaiyum marandaduvum sariyalla enru sholli
